text: Raúl Torrez (born July 24, 1976) is an American lawyer and politician. He is a member of the Democratic Party. Torrez has been the 32nd Attorney General of New Mexico since 2023. ==References== Category:Living people Category:New Mexico attorneys general Category:Politicians from Albuquerque, New Mexico Category:1976 births Category:Lawyers from Albuquerque, New Mexico Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Raúl Torrez
